info.name: Selenium IDE per-tab coloured menu text
info.description:
It makes top level Selenium IDE menu text blue, green or red, depending on the URL. It works for Selenium IDE open in Firefox browser window/tab at one of URLs
  • chrome://selenium-ide/content/selenium-ide.xul#RED
  • chrome://selenium-ide/content/selenium-ide.xul#BLUE
  • chrome://selenium-ide/content/selenium-ide.xul#GREEN
  • chrome://selenium-ide/content/selenium-ide.xul#WHITE
It doesn't apply to standard Selenium IDE, which is detached from browser window.
